title: Help me please im new :/
body: so i have been exclusively playing lux i switch it up a little and play ashe and ahrai sometimes and then i realized my lux had a symbol and a number under her name what does this mean please help. thank you {{champion:99}}

replies.body: Agreed, based on these details it sounds like you're referring to [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide).  The more you play a champion, the more mastery levels you'll gain for it!  Check that guide for more info, but I hope that helps.
It's likely your mastery level on lux
